TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ZipArchive extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示 Zip 存档格式中的一个压缩文件包。

span.span: Represents a package of compressed files in the zip archive format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于操作的 zip 存档和其文件条目的方法将分布在三个类： ， ，和。The methods for manipulating zip archives and their file entries are spread across three classes: , , and . |到To|使用Use| |--------|---------| |从目录中创建的 zip 存档Create a zip archive from a directory|| |提取到目录的 zip 存档的内容Extract the contents of a zip archive to a directory|| |将新文件添加到现有的 zip 存档Add new files to an existing zip archive|| |从 zip 存档文件中检索Retrieve a file from a zip archive|| |从 zip 存档中检索所有文件Retrieve all the files from a zip archive|| |打开 zip 存档中包含的单一文件的流Open a stream to a single file contained in a zip archive|| |从 zip 存档中删除文件Delete a file from a zip archive|| 当你创建新的条目时，该文件被压缩，并添加到的 zip 包。When you create a new entry, the file is compressed and added to the zip package. 方法可指定目录层次结构时将项添加。The method enables you to specify a directory hierarchy when adding the entry. 包括新的条目的 zip 包中的相对路径。You include the relative path of the new entry within the zip package. 例如，使用的相对路径创建新的条目`AddedFolder\NewFile.txt`在一个名为 AddedFolder 目录中创建压缩的文本文件。For example, creating a new entry with a relative path of `AddedFolder\NewFile.txt` creates a compressed text file in a directory named AddedFolder. 如果引用`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`程序集在项目中，你可以访问三个扩展方法 (从类) 的类： ， ，和。If you reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project, you can access three extension methods (from the class) for the class: , , and . 这些扩展方法，可以压缩和解压缩到文件的项的内容。These extension methods enable you to compress and decompress the contents of the entry to a file. `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`程序集不可用于[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用。The `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly is not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 在[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用，你可以压缩和解压缩文件使用或类，也可以使用[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]类型[压缩程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=246357)和[解压缩程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=246358)。In [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps, you can compress and decompress files by using the or class, or you can use the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] types [Compressor](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=246357) and [Decompressor](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=246358). ## Examples 第一个示例演示如何创建新的条目，并向其中写入使用流。The first example shows how to create a new entry and write to it by using a stream. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/vb/program1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何打开 zip 存档，并循环访问的项的集合。The following example shows how to open a zip archive and iterate through the collection of entries. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)] 第三个示例演示如何使用扩展方法在从现有的文件的 zip 存档中创建新的条目和提取存档内容。The third example shows how to use extension methods to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file and extract the archive contents. 必须引用`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`程序集执行代码。You must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly to execute the code. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)]

summary.span: 从指定的流并使用指定的模式初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`mode`参数设置为，流必须支持读取。If the `mode` parameter is set to , the stream must support reading. 如果`mode`参数设置为，流必须支持写入。If the `mode` parameter is set to , the stream must support writing. 如果`mode`参数设置为，该流必须支持读取、 写入和查找。If the `mode` parameter is set to , the stream must support reading, writing, and seeking.

exception.span: 流已关闭，或流的功能与模式不相匹配。

span.span: The stream is already closed, or the capabilities of the stream do not match the mode.
is .
is an invalid value.

exception.span: 流的内容无法被解释为 zip 存档。

span.span: The contents of the stream could not be interpreted as a zip archive.

exception.span: - 或 - 是 ，但存档中缺少项，或者项已损坏且无法读取。

span.span: -or- is and an entry is missing from the archive or is corrupt and cannot be read.

exception.span: - 或 - 是 ，但项太大，无法装入内存。

span.span: -or- is and an entry is too large to fit into memory.

span.span: The input or output stream.

param.name: mode
param.span: 指示 zip 存档是否用于读取、创建或更新项的一个枚举值。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether the zip archive is used to read, create, or update entries.

param.span: 如果在释放 对象后保持流处于打开状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to leave the stream open after the object is disposed; otherwise, .

param.name: entryNameEncoding
param.span: 在存档中读取或写入项名时使用的编码。

span.span: The encoding to use when reading or writing entry names in this archive.

param.span: 仅当需要针对具有不支持项名的 UTF-8 编码的 zip 归档工具和库的互操作性进行编码时，为此参数指定一个值。

span.span: Specify a value for this parameter only when an encoding is required for interoperability with zip archive tools and libraries that do not support UTF-8 encoding for entry names.

summary.span: 对于指定的模式，初始化指定流上的 类的新实例，使用项名的指定编码，并选择性地使流保持打开状态。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class on the specified stream for the specified mode, uses the specified encoding for entry names, and optionally leaves the stream open.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`mode`参数设置为，流必须支持读取。If the `mode` parameter is set to , the stream must support reading. 如果`mode`参数设置为，流必须支持写入。If the `mode` parameter is set to , the stream must support writing. 如果`mode`参数设置为，该流必须支持读取、 写入和查找。If the `mode` parameter is set to , the stream must support reading, writing, and seeking. 当打开读取的 zip 存档文件和`entryNameEncoding`设置为`null`，条目名称解码根据下列规则：When you open a zip archive file for reading and `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - 如果未设置编码标志 （在本地文件头的通用的位标志） 的语言，当前的系统默认代码页用于解码条目名称。When the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is not set, the current system default code page is used to decode the entry name. - 设置语言编码标志后，utf-8 用于对条目名称解码。When the language encoding flag is set, UTF-8 is used to decode the entry name. 当打开读取的 zip 存档文件和`entryNameEncoding`设置一个值为非`null`，条目名称解码根据下列规则：When you open a zip archive file for reading and `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - 编码标志的语言未设置时，指定`entryNameEncoding`用于解码条目名称。When the language encoding flag is not set, the specified `entryNameEncoding` is used to decode the entry name. - 设置语言编码标志后，utf-8 用于对条目名称解码。When the language encoding flag is set, UTF-8 is used to decode the entry name. 当你编写以将文件存档和`entryNameEncoding`设置为`null`，条目名称是根据以下规则进行编码：When you write to archive files and `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, entry names are encoded according to the following rules: - 包含 ASCII 范围外的字符的项名称，设置语言编码标志，并通过使用 utf-8 条目名称进行编码。For entry names that contain characters outside the ASCII range, the language encoding flag is set, and entry names are encoded by using UTF-8. - 仅包含 ASCII 字符的项名称，未设置语言编码标志，并通过使用当前的系统默认代码页的条目名称进行编码。For entry names that contain only ASCII characters, the language encoding flag is not set, and entry names are encoded by using the current system default code page. 当你编写以将文件存档和`entryNameEncoding`设置一个值为非`null`，指定`entryNameEncoding`用于转换为字节编码条目名称。When you write to archive files and `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, the specified `entryNameEncoding` is used to encode the entry names into bytes. 仅当指定的编码为 utf-8 编码时设置编码标志 （在本地文件头的通用的位标志） 的语言。The language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is set only when the specified encoding is a UTF-8 encoding.

summary.span: 在 zip 存档中创建空项。

span.span: Creates an empty entry in the zip archive.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntry (string entryName);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntry(string entryName) cil managed
Public Function CreateEntry (entryName As String) As ZipArchiveEntry
public: System::IO::Compression::ZipArchiveEntry ^ CreateEntry(System::String ^ entryName);
member this.CreateEntry : string -> System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry

param.name: entryName
param.span: 相对于存档的根的路径指定了要创建项的名称。

span.span: A path, relative to the root of the archive, that specifies the name of the entry to be created.

summary.span: 创建在 zip 存档中有指定路径和项名的空项。

span.span: Creates an empty entry that has the specified path and entry name in the zip archive.

returns.span: 在 zip 存档中的空项。

span.span: An empty entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `entryName`字符串应反映你想要在 zip 存档中创建的项的相对路径。The `entryName` string should reflect the relative path of the entry you want to create within the zip archive. 没有您提供的字符串受限制。There is no restriction on the string you provide. 但是，如果它未格式化为相对路径，创建项，但提取 zip 存档的内容时，可能会收到异常。However, if it is not formatted as a relative path, the entry is created, but you may get an exception when you extract the contents of the zip archive. 如果在存档中已存在具有指定的路径和名称的项，第二个条目被创建具有相同的路径和名称。If an entry with the specified path and name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with the same path and name. 值新项的属性设置为当前时间。The value of the property for the new entry is set to the current time. 使用默认压缩级别的基础的压缩算法来压缩条目。The entry is compressed using the default compression level of the underlying compression algorithm. 如果你想要指定不同的压缩级别，使用方法。If you want to specify a different compression level, use the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个条目，并向其中写入使用流。The following example shows how to create an entry and write to it by using a stream. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/vb/program1.vb#1)]

span.span: is .
is .
The zip archive does not support writing.
The zip archive has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntry (string entryName, System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel compressionLevel);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntry(string entryName, valuetype System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel compressionLevel) cil managed
public: System::IO::Compression::ZipArchiveEntry ^ CreateEntry(System::String ^ entryName, System::IO::Compression::CompressionLevel compressionLevel);
member this.CreateEntry : string * System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel -> System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry

param.name: entryName
param.span: 相对于存档的根的路径指定了要创建项的名称。

span.span: A path, relative to the root of the archive, that specifies the name of the entry to be created.

param.name: compressionLevel
param.span: 指示创建项时是否强调速度或压缩有效性的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression effectiveness when creating the entry.

summary.span: 创建在 zip 存档中有指定项名和压缩级别的空项。

span.span: Creates an empty entry that has the specified entry name and compression level in the zip archive.

returns.span: 在 zip 存档中的空项。

span.span: An empty entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `entryName`字符串应反映你想要在 zip 存档中创建的项的相对路径。The `entryName` string should reflect the relative path of the entry you want to create within the zip archive. 没有您提供的字符串受限制。There is no restriction on the string you provide. 但是，如果它未格式化为相对路径，创建项，但提取 zip 存档的内容时，可能会收到异常。However, if it is not formatted as a relative path, the entry is created, but you may get an exception when you extract the contents of the zip archive. 如果在存档中已存在一个具有指定名称的项，第二个条目被创建具有相同的名称。If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with the same name. 值新项的属性设置为当前时间。The value of the property for the new entry is set to the current time. 设置`compressionLevel`参数如果你想要压缩的文件尽可能多地。Set the `compressionLevel` parameter to if you want the file to be compressed as much as possible. 设置`compressionLevel`参数仅当您担心，压缩操作将完成速度是否足够快为你的方案。Set the `compressionLevel` parameter to only if you are concerned that the compression operation will not complete quickly enough for your scenario. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个条目，以实现最佳压缩级别。The following example shows how to create an entry with the optimal compression level. 通过使用一个流，它还可写入新条目的速度。It also writes to the new entry by using a stream. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/vb/program2.vb#2)]

The zip archive does not support writing.

summary.span: 释放由 对象使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例使用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法完成写入存档，释放使用的所有资源对象。This method finishes writing the archive and releases all resources used by the object. 除非通过使用构造对象构造函数重载并设置其`leaveOpen`参数`true`，所有的基础流已关闭不再可用于的后续写入操作。Unless you construct the object by using the constructor overload and set its `leaveOpen` parameter to `true`, all underlying streams are closed and no longer available for subsequent write operations. 在完成使用的此实例时，调用释放此实例所使用的所有资源。When you are finished using this instance of , call to release all resources used by this instance. 你应该可以消除进一步引用到此实例，以便垃圾回收器才能回收而不是保留它终止的实例的内存。You should eliminate further references to this instance so that the garbage collector can reclaim the memory of the instance instead of keeping it alive for finalization. 调用方法，其中包含要释放托管和非托管资源的代码。 calls the method, which contains the code to release managed and unmanaged resources. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示完成存档的写入并释放未托管和托管资源； 则仅释放未托管资源。

span.span: to finish writing the archive and release unmanaged and managed resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 由 和 方法调用，以释放 类的当前实例使用的未托管资源，并选择性地完成存档的写入和释放托管资源。

span.span: Called by the and methods to release the unmanaged resources used by the current instance of the class, and optionally finishes writing the archive and releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`disposing`设置为`true`，所有的基础流已关闭不再可用于的后续写入操作，除非通过使用构造对象构造函数重载并设置其`leaveOpen`参数`true`.If `disposing` is set to `true`, all underlying streams are closed and no longer available for subsequent write operations, unless you construct the object by using the constructor overload and set its `leaveOpen` parameter to `true`. 此方法称为仅由公共和方法; 这些方法不直接调用此方法。This method is called only by the public and methods; do not call this method directly. 当实现的释放模式的布尔参数方法应在使用，如下所示：When you implement the dispose pattern, the Boolean parameter of the method should be used as follows: - 当前对象的方法应调用布尔参数设置为`true`释放托管和非托管资源。The method of the current object should call with the Boolean parameter set to `true` to release both managed and unmanaged resources. - 当前对象的方法应调用布尔参数设置为`false`若要仅释放非托管的资源。The method of the current object should call with the Boolean parameter set to `false` to release only unmanaged resources. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see .

span.span: The collection of entries that are currently in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要检索的项的整个集合属性。Use the property to retrieve the entire collection of entries. 使用方法来按名称检索单个条目。Use the method to retrieve a single entry by name. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何打开 zip 存档，并循环访问的项的集合。The following example shows how to open a zip archive and iterate through the collection of entries. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在存档中存在具有指定的名称的多个条目，则返回第一个。If multiple entries that have the specified name exist in the archive, the first one is returned. 项名称相比`entryName`使用序号比较。The name of the entry is compared to `entryName` using ordinal comparison. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来检索一个条目。The following example shows how to use the method to retrieve an entry.
